EmailTemplate.name: NBham Team Takeover
EmailTemplate.subject: Birmingham Takeover!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.Name}
Don't forget:
The Challenge need you to Take Over Birmingham!
Give up your time this Easter to shape NCS in Birmingham
We need you to design Sponsorship Events for the next NCS programme
Got some great ideas?
We want to hear from you!
You have only until Monday to express your interest:
The Takeover will take place on Friday 10th April, from 11am-3pm in the centre of Birmingham
To apply fill in the link below by Monday 6th April. We will let successful candidates know by Tuesday 7th April.
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1VZOX6xtUmUYZvz2gwt5Tq1K2Jbc8Z-Fr9UwRjrTu1PU/viewform?usp=send_form
If you have any questions call or text Rosa: 07880 038 093
Thanks,
Rosa
